text: Francine Smith (n√©e Ling; formerly Dawson) (born September 26, 1967) is a fictional character on the animated television series American Dad!. She is the wife of the title character Stan Smith and the mother of Hayley and Steve. Francine is voiced by Wendy Schaal. She was adopted by Asian parents when her wealthy parents decided to leave her behind at an airport because she was too young to travel in first-class. ==References== Category:Fictional American people Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2005 Category:American Dad! characters
title: Francine Smith
